channel.title: +1 Forward - Descent into Midnight
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/november-27th-2019
Rich and Rach interview Rich Howard and Richard Kreutz-Landry about their game Descent into Midnight, which is coming to Kickstarter in early 2020! *Third game designer Taylor couldn't make the recording, sadly.*
Timecodes: 3:27 - Read a Sitch with Richard talking about being brave as an MC and trusting your players 9:33 - Read a Sitch with Rich H handling surprise player-created pregens at cons 15:48 - Open your Brain to Descent into Midnight 31:59 - Act Under Fire
Check out the game here: https://descentintomidnight.com/
The Masks episode of Whelmed Rich H mentioned: https://crashingthemode.com/podcast/2017/6/21/masks-ap-relations-episode-01
